text: Trump adminstration rolls back mercury rules for coal-fired power plants - The Allegheny Front
fullText: The rule for mercury emissions from coal-fired power plants will be rolled back to a 2012 standard. Mercury is a neurotoxin.

text: Nuggets play Trail Blazers on back-to-back - NBA
fullText: Denver wraps up its 12th back-to-back of the season. They're 7-4 on the second night of a back-to-back, winning three of their last four "no rest" games.

text: Scientists May Have Found The Key Cellular Process Behind Aging in Animals - ScienceAlert
fullText: A study on worms led by researchers from Vanderbilt University School of Medicine in the US has uncovered a previously unknown adaptation to aging that actively remodels one of the largest and most complex structures in our cells.

text: Multiple people at state wrestling tournament diagnosed with measles as it spreads in Utah - KSL News
fullText: Utah health officials say cases of measles are spreading to new areas in Utah, particularly in schools and at extracurricular events like a recent state wrestling tournament.

text: Give Punch a break! Zoo responds to heartbreaking video of baby monkey - USA Today
fullText: In a new video of Punch, the baby monkey is dragged around in circles by an adult monkey, upsetting animal lovers around the globe. The zoo explains.
